meta.title: KVKK Disclosure Text - WaveArc
meta.description: Disclosure text under Law No. 6698 on Protection of Personal Data.

intro.text: We would like to inform you, our valued visitors, about the processing of your personal data in accordance with Law No. 6698 on Protection of Personal Data ('KVKK').

controller.title: 1. Data Controller
controller.text: Your personal data may be processed by WaveArc as the data controller within the scope described below:

data.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
data.text: The following personal data is collected through our website:

purpose.title: 3. Purposes of Processing Personal Data
purpose.text: Your collected personal data is processed for the following purposes:
purpose.communication: Respond to your contact requests and communicate with you
purpose.analytics: Analyze website usage and improve user experience

legal.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing Personal Data
legal.text: Your personal data is processed based on the following legal grounds specified in Articles 5 and 6 of KVKK:

consent.title: Explicit Consent
consent.text: Your explicit consent provided through the contact form

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimate.text: Our legitimate interest for website security and analytics

transfer.title: 5. Transfer of Personal Data
transfer.text: Your personal data is shared with the following third-party service providers:
transfer.resend: Used for email delivery. GDPR-compliant data processing agreement in place.
transfer.google: Used to analyze website traffic. Only anonymous and aggregate data is processed.
transfer.vercel: Provides website hosting services. Secure infrastructure and GDPR compliance available.
transfer.protection: For international data transfers, measures stipulated in Article 9 of KVKK are taken, and we work with countries with adequate protection or companies with data protection agreements.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention Period
retention.text: Your personal data is deleted, destroyed, or anonymized when the processing purpose ceases or legal retention periods expire:

rights.title: 7. Rights of Data Subjects
rights.text: You have the following rights under Article 11 of KVKK:
rights.learn: Learn whether your personal data is being processed
rights.purpose: Request information if processed and learn the purpose
rights.thirdParty: Know the third parties to whom data is transferred domestically or abroad
rights.correction: Request correction if processed incorrectly or incompletely
rights.deletion: Request deletion or destruction under the conditions of Article 7 of KVKK
rights.notification: Request notification of corrections, deletions to third parties
rights.objection: Object to adverse results from automated processing
rights.complaint: Request compensation for damages due to unlawful processing and file complaints with the Personal Data Protection Authority

application.title: 8. Application Method
application.text: You can apply through the following methods to exercise your rights mentioned above:
application.email: By email: Send your petition with identity documents to mete@wavearc.co
application.identity: Identity verification will be performed and authentication may be requested for security reasons.
application.specific: You must clearly state which right you wish to exercise in your application.
application.response: Your request will be finalized free of charge within 30 days at the latest. If the transaction requires additional cost, the fee determined by the Personal Data Protection Board may be charged.

intro.text: This Cookie Policy explains how cookies are used on the WaveArc website.

what.text: Cookies are small text files saved to your device (computer, tablet, phone) when you visit a website.
what.purpose: Cookies are used to ensure proper website functioning, improve user experience, and analyze site usage.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.text: We use two types of cookies on our website:

essential.title: 1. Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website's core functions and cannot be disabled:

session.name: Session Cookies

essential.required: These cookies are required for the website to function

analytics.title: 2. Analytics Cookies (Optional)

ga.purpose: Main Google Analytics cookie, identifies users

analytics.optional: You can manage these cookies in cookie settings

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
